messages.subject: a very cool piece of art
messages.msgSnippet: _http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/supercoolpicillusion.html_ (http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/supercoolpicillusion.html) There was a Christmas special some
messages.messageBody:
_http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/supercoolpicillusion.html_
(http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/supercoolpicillusion.html)


There was a Christmas special some years back and one of the views
(animated) is going into the window, and into an ornament that has a little village
scene it it, and into a window of that, and then a story starts (I think).
This is like that, but way moreso.

You can control it with the mouse. You can go slower, forward or backwards.

Marty showed it to me.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
